menu.description: Italy's 'King of Wines'. Founded in 1890, the Damilano estate is now in its fourth generation and continues to produce some of the most powerful and compelling wines of the region. The 'Lecinquevigne' name refers to the 5 famous vineyards from which their old-vine Nebbiolo grapes are grown: Bussia, Le Coste, Castellero, Ravera, and La Cavourrina.

menu.description: The closest you can get to the Gyu-Kaku yakiniku experience without grilling the meat yourself. Customize your meal! Select two proteins as single or double portions, two marinades, and rice portion. Includes Miso Soup, White Rice, and a Set Salad.

The closest you can get to the Gyu-Kaku yakiniku experience without grilling the meat yourself. Customize your meal! Select three proteins as single or double portions, three marinades, and rice portion. Includes Miso Soup, White Rice, and a Set Salad.

Crunchy Garlic Shrimp atop thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with sliced garlic, crunchy chili garlic oil, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds. Mildly spicy.
Thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with chicken, sliced garlic, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.
Our signature thin-sliced Sukiyaki-marinated beef stir-fried with white rice, egg yolk, mushrooms, and sliced onions. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.

Our beloved Sukiyaki Bibimbap goes BEYOND. 100% plant-based Beyond Beef is marinated in our secret Sukiyaki sauce and stir fried with mushrooms, diced red bell peppers, and sliced white onions. Served over rice. Topped with chopped green onions and sesame seeds. Also contains butter and sesame oil. Picture for visualization purposes only. Beyond Bibimbap will arrive pre-mixed.
Japanese Fried Chicken Karaage on a bed of white rice and shredded cabbage. Topped with Japanese Chili Mayo and chopped green onions.

Our Garlic Fried Rice features white rice stir-fried with egg yolk, sliced onions, sliced garlic. Seasoned with a combination of our Shio Soy Sauce, butter, sesame oil, and black pepper. Topped with chopped green onions and fried garlic chips.
Premium roast beef on a bed of mixed greens and steamed rice. Topped with white and green onions, Signature soy-based barbecue sauce, and kuki wasabi.
Beef rib meat and rice dowsed in our signature Umakara Sauce and mixed with an assortment of bell pepper, shishito pepper, and corn, then garnished with sesame, green onions, and chili flakes.
Thin-sliced Yakishabu beef marinated in our sweet & spicy Umakara sauce with sliced onions on a bed of white rice and shredded cabbage. Topped with chopped green onions and sesame seeds.

Gyu-Kaku original recipe: Japanese BBQ meets Ramen! Rich kalbi beef soup and medium thickness ramen noodles topped with thin-sliced beef, boiled egg, green onions, spinach, daikon radish, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.

Our Tonkotsu pork bone ramen comes with chunky, fatty braised pork belly Kakuni chashu and is topped with hard-boiled egg, chopped green onions, diced red bell peppers, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.

Beef and shio-based soup with medium-thick ramen noodles and thick braised pork belly Kakuni chashu. Toppings also include boiled egg, green onion, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.

We have put together some of our fan favorites to create a well-balance meal that feeds four. Substitutions respectfully declined. Includes: 1x Gyu-Combo with 7 oz Yaki-shabu Beef in Miso, 1x Gyu-Combo with 7 oz Toro Beef in Sweet Soy Tare, 1x Beef Sukiyaki Fried Rice, 1x Garlic Shoyu Chicken Noodles, 1x Black Pepper Wings, 1x Fried Pork Gyoza, 1x Gyu-Kaku Salad, 1x Edamame, and 1x Napa Kimchi

A TRIPLE SERVING of our Crowd Favorite: Sukiyaki Fried Rice with Beef. Serves 3-5 people. Our signature thin-sliced Sukiyaki-marinated beef stir-fried with white rice, egg yolk, mushrooms, and sliced onions. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green Onions, and sesame seeds.

A TRIPLE SERVING of our Crowd Favorite: Mega Garlic Noodles with Chicken. Serves 3-5 people. Thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with chicken, sliced garlic, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.

An herbal and aromatic dish featuring Thai eggplant, long beans, pumpkin, lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, basil, green onion, green bean, cabbage and dill. Fermented fish sauce (Pla Ra) adds umami. Choice of protein available.

Choice of protein stir-fried with smoked chili paste sauce, cashews, ginkgo beans, bell peppers, carrots, water chestnuts, and onions. Topped with white pepper and roasted chili. *Recommended with fried chicken.
A flavorful stir-fry of fresh broccoli, carrot, mushroom and baby corn tossed in a savory oyster sauce, delivering the perfect balance of rich and aromatic flavors. Choice of protein.

A one-of-a-kind dish, served throughout Thailand's railroad history. Made with tomatoes, Chinese broccoli, onions, and eggs, and served with sliced cucumber, green onions, and lime, topped with a dash of white pepper.

An appealing bouquet of peach and apple aroma. A very balanced and harmonious wine with delicate aromas and minerality.
Boasts bright, fresh aromas and flavors of citrus, pear, apple and white flowers. Its creamy texture is supported by fresh acidity and a long, clean finish.
Fruit forward with a touch of apple, peach, and apricot with a slight spice. Fresh and tangy, fine spices; white pepper and round body.

A fresh, floral nose with notes of acacia flowers. On the palate, it is dry and well-balanced with lively fruit flavors.

menu.item_name: Sparkling Ros√© Bricco Riella Moscato D 'Asti Italy
menu.description: Moscato D'Asti is a semi-sweet, lightly sparkling, low-alcohol wine from Piedmont, in north-western Italy. The classic Moscato D'Asti wine is characterized by elegant floral aromas and notes of peach, apricot, and fresh grape juice.
Delicately, faint pink Ros√©! Fresh, with hints of melon, fresh berries. Beautifully perfumed. Honeysuckle, strawberry, cherry, and resounding minerality that leads to an enchanting finish.

An intense mousse and a bright cherry color, pronounced aromas of ripe strawberry and cherry, and an elegant acidity adding freshness while pairing harmoniously with the discrete presence of sugars create a wine that is at the same time dynamic and balanced.
The wine offers fresh and rich fruity aromas of apple and pear with a hint of citrus fruit that fades into the floral bouquet.
Fine and subtle nose with pleasant aromas of small black fruits. A supple and round mouth with soft tannins and a nice freshness.
Intense bouquet of dark cherry, barnyard, and dark chocolate. It is medium bodied, juicy, dry, and smooth. The extracted flavors of cherry, plum, cranberry, and black pepper blend nicely.

Boasting relatively young and rather fertile soils, this terroir, with the help of modern viticulturist and wine-making techniques, is well-suited to bringing out all of the aromas and flavors of each grape variety.
A pretty, smooth, and approachable Malbec with partial and subtle oak aging, leaving the emphasis on the spice, damson, and black cherry flavors.
Juicy and jammy, yet well-structured and balanced. Bright red aromas of ripe raspberry, plum, and licorice. Deep, lively, and vibrant flavors on the palate. Velvety tasting with a solid finish.
This wine gets its personality from the 50 to 100-year-old vines where the grapes are grown from. Flavors of sweet cherries, blackberries, and earthy spice. Jammy and robust through the long finish.
Spicy aromas of dark fruits, cassis, cherry, plum, vanilla, oak, and slight chocolate in the glass

All-natural chicken breast coated in a fragrant honey glaze, served over roasted parmesan broccoli and cauliflower, and topped with toasted almonds and tart cranberries. Its crunchy, sweet, savory, and so satisfying. (2 servings)

Get ready for Italian comfort food. It starts with a creamy and downright addictive artichoke sauce. Then were mixing it up with sauted shrimp and roasted broccoli served on a bed of orzo. With fresh garlic bread on the side, its a dinner the whole family will go crazy for. (2 servings)

With extra-firm tofu in place of chicken and our own mix of spices, we came up with a taste that we love even more than the original. Were making sliders with chive aioli, a soft, tender bun and roasted fingerling potato fries. Even non-vegetarians will love this dish! (2 servings)

Classic French flavors in a single recipe: oven-roasted potatoes coated in truffle-butter and Parmesan cheese, roasted broccoli and a juicy, truffle-buttery steak. Its bistro food cooked in your own kitchen. (2 servings)

We adore the flavors of a classic Souvlaki, but on a busy weeknight, marinating the meat and loading up skewers is more work than we want. Ours is a streamlined version with lemony chicken served over a flavorful rice pilaf and cooling roasted red pepper Tzatziki sauce. it is just as flavorful but without the fuss. (2 servings)

We adore the dark, tangy-sweet flavor of Asian BBQ sauce. Were pairing it with seared salmon, sauted carrots and green cabbage for a dinner thats fresh, tasty, and on the table in just 15 minutes. (2 servings)
Toasted gnocchi is a perfect partner for black beans, sweet corn and poblano peppers. Topped with Chihuahua and Monterey Jack cheese and cooked until melty and delicious. Heaven. (2 servings)

menu.item_name: Rotini di Modena with Chicken & Spinach
menu.description: This gem starts with a creamy balsamic sauce members have gone wild for. Paired with juicy chicken breast, sauted spinach and rotini pasta, it's a speedy recipe the family will love. (2 servings)
We're cooking up edamame, carrots and snow peas, and then tossing them with Himalayan red rice and our famous Ginger-Soy Aioli. It's a Japanese-style rice bowl your family will love. (2 servings)

A classic Spanish paella. Rice cooked in a flavorful broth of coriander, oregano and paprika, mixed up with sauted broccoli, cauliflower, shrimp and chorizo. Its a taste of Spain thats perfect on a chilly night. (2 servings)

menu.item_name: Cream of Tomato Soup with Grilled Cheese Croutons (Veg)
menu.description: We're turning classic grilled cheese and tomato soup upside down by serving toasted gruyere croutons right in the creamy soup. The combination can't be beat. (2 servings)
Add an all-natural, cage-free, hormone-free chicken breast to your entree. (per serving)
Our proprietary steak cut, bistro chateau, is tender like a filet mignon and flavorful like a sirloin. (per serving)
Norway's coastline, with its cold, clear Arctic waters, provide the perfect conditions for our sustainably harvested, delicate, flaky, melt-in-your-mouth premium Norwegian salmon. (per serving)
Fine-dining-restaurant quality, premium shrimp are a great addition to recommended entrees. (per serving)
Meez's extra large version of the classic decadent Italian dessert. Ladyfingers soaked in coffee with mascarpone and powdered cocoa. (per serving)
Two rich, chocolate and caramel brownies topped with fudge brownie cubes and toasted pecans, then drizzled with milk chocolate ganache. (per serving)

If you think you have tasted carrot cake before, well you are just plain wrong. THE Carrot Cake will be something you will be talking about for some time to come. Since you get not one but two slices, you can argue with your family member over who likes it more. (per serving)
Creamy and chunky peanut butter with pure cane sugar and cage free eggs and peanut butter chips. Three large cookies hand forked like moms. Non GMO and additive free. (per serving)

Giant morsels of sustainable semisweet and dark chocolate grown in the Peruvian Andes. Non GMO, additive free and made with real cane sugar and cage free eggs. Portion includes three large cookies. (per serving)

Fresh Organic Spinach and pan-seared vegan Cheese, seasoned with Cumin, Onion, Cinnamon, Cardamom, and Garam Masala spices. High in Iron.
Sauteed Smoked Vegan Cheese, Bell Pepper and Diced Onion, topped with stir-fried Organic Tofu. Bell Peppers are a good source of vitamin C and B6, and good for your hair and skin.
Fresh Moong Lentils, sauted in Olive Oil with Cumin, Fresh Green Tomato and Onion. A popular Moms homemade Indian dish. Great source of protein and antioxidants.
An exotic blend of Yellow Lentils and Fresh Organic Spinach, seasoned with Ginger and Garlic. High in Protein and Iron.
A Sweet Potato and Green Vegetable dumpling, topped with a delicious Cashew Gravy, garnished with Cardamom, Almond and Cashew. Most popular Arya Bhavan dish.
Black Lentils, pan cooked with Tomato, Ginger and Garlic. Good source of protein.
